mapper.select: SELECT V.RSV_NO, TO_CHAR(V.CHECKIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CHECKIN", TO_CHAR(V.CHECKOUT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CHECKOUT", TO_CHAR(V.STAY_PRICE, '999,999,999') AS "PRICE", V.STAY_PRICE, V.RSV_DATE, V.RSV_STATUS, V.RSV_WAY, R.RM_NUM, T.RT_NAME, M.NAME, M.PHONE, V.MOD_DATE, TO_CHAR(V.STAY_PRICE - P.PRICE, '999,999,999') AS "RFD_PRICE" FROM RSV V JOIN ROOM R ON (V.RM_NO = R.RM_NO) JOIN ROOM_TYPE T ON (R.RT_NO = T.RT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (V.MNO = M.MNO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT RSV_NO, PRICE FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAY_STATUS = 'REFUND') P ON (V.RSV_NO = P.RSV_NO) WHERE R.RM_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.TYPE = 'CLIENT' AND SUBSTR(RSV_DATE, 1, 10) = TO_CHAR((SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60)), 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY V.RSV_NO DESC

SELECT V.RSV_NO, TO_CHAR(V.CHECKIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CHECKIN", TO_CHAR(V.CHECKOUT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CHECKOUT", TO_CHAR(V.STAY_PRICE, '999,999,999') AS "PRICE", V.STAY_PRICE, V.RSV_DATE, V.RSV_STATUS, V.RSV_WAY, R.RM_NUM, T.RT_NAME, M.NAME, M.PHONE, V.MOD_DATE, TO_CHAR(V.STAY_PRICE - P.PRICE, '999,999,999') AS "RFD_PRICE" FROM RSV V JOIN ROOM R ON (V.RM_NO = R.RM_NO) JOIN ROOM_TYPE T ON (R.RT_NO = T.RT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (V.MNO = M.MNO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT RSV_NO, PRICE FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAY_STATUS = 'REFUND') P ON (V.RSV_NO = P.RSV_NO) WHERE R.RM_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.TYPE = 'CLIENT' AND SUBSTR(RSV_DATE, 1, 10) = #{day} ORDER BY V.RSV_NO DESC
SELECT R.RM_NO, R.RM_NUM, R.FLOOR, R.RT_NO, T.RT_NAME FROM ROOM R JOIN ROOM_TYPE T ON (R.RT_NO = T.RT_NO) WHERE R.RM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY RT_NAME, RM_NUM

SELECT R.RM_NO, R.RM_NUM, R.FLOOR, R.RM_STATUS, T.RT_NO, T.RT_NAME, N.CLEAN_STATUS, S.REAL_CI, S.STAY_NO, TO_CHAR(S.CHECKIN, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "S_CHECKIN", TO_CHAR(S.CHECKOUT, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "S_CHECKOUT", S.STAY_STATUS, S.STAY_TYPE, S.PRICE AS "STAY_PRICE", V.RSV_NO, TO_CHAR(V.CHECKIN, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "R_CHECKIN", TO_CHAR(V.CHECKOUT, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "R_CHECKOUT", V.STAY_PRICE AS "RSV_PRICE", V.RSV_STATUS, V.CI_TIME, M1.MNO AS "RMNO", M1.NAME AS "RNAME", M2.MNO AS "SMNO", M2.NAME AS "SNAME", TO_CHAR(B.BRK_BEGIN, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "BRK_BEGIN", TO_CHAR(B.BRK_END, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "BRK_END", BRK_RSN, R.STD_PER, T.MAXPER, M1.PHONE AS "RPHONE", M2.PHONE AS "SPHONE" FROM ROOM R LEFT JOIN ROOM_TYPE T ON (R.RT_NO = T.RT_NO) LEFT JOIN ROOM_STT N ON (R.RM_NO = N.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM STAY WHERE TO_CHAR(CHECKIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR((SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60)) + 13, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(CHECKOUT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND STAY_STATUS = 'N') S ON (R.RM_NO = S.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM RSV WHERE TO_CHAR(CHECKIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR((SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60)) + 13, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(CHECKOUT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND RSV_STATUS IN ('OK', 'WAIT')) V ON (R.RM_NO = V.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M1 ON (V.MNO = M1.MNO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (S.MNO = M2.MNO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT RM_NO, BRK_BEGIN, BRK_END, BRK_RSN FROM ROOM LEFT JOIN BROKEN_HIS USING (RM_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(BRK_BEGIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR((SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60)) + 13, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(BRK_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND BRK_STATUS = 'Y') B ON (R.RM_NO = B.RM_NO) WHERE R.RM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY T.RT_NAME, RM_NUM

SELECT R.RM_NUM, B.BRK_BEGIN, B.BRK_END, B.BRK_RSN, M.NAME, B.BRK_STATUS FROM BROKEN_HIS B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MNO = M.MNO) JOIN ROOM R ON (B.RM_NO = R.RM_NO) WHERE B.RM_NO = #{rmNo} AND BRK_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT R.RM_NO, R.RM_NUM, R.FLOOR, R.RM_STATUS, T.RT_NO, T.RT_NAME, N.CLEAN_STATUS, S.REAL_CI, S.STAY_NO, TO_CHAR(S.CHECKIN, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "S_CHECKIN", TO_CHAR(S.CHECKOUT, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "S_CHECKOUT", S.STAY_STATUS, S.STAY_TYPE, S.PRICE AS "STAY_PRICE", V.RSV_NO, TO_CHAR(V.CHECKIN, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "R_CHECKIN", TO_CHAR(V.CHECKOUT, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "R_CHECKOUT", V.STAY_PRICE AS "RSV_PRICE", V.RSV_STATUS, V.CI_TIME, M1.MNO AS "RMNO", M1.NAME AS "RNAME", M2.MNO AS "SMNO", M2.NAME AS "SNAME", TO_CHAR(B.BRK_BEGIN, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "BRK_BEGIN", TO_CHAR(B.BRK_END, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "BRK_END", BRK_RSN, R.STD_PER, T.MAXPER, M1.PHONE AS "RPHONE", M2.PHONE AS "SPHONE" FROM ROOM R LEFT JOIN ROOM_TYPE T ON (R.RT_NO = T.RT_NO) LEFT JOIN ROOM_STT N ON (R.RM_NO = N.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM STAY WHERE TO_CHAR(CHECKIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{day}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 13, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(CHECKOUT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{day} AND STAY_STATUS = 'N') S ON (R.RM_NO = S.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM RSV WHERE TO_CHAR(CHECKIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{day}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 13, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(CHECKOUT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{day} AND RSV_STATUS IN ('OK', 'WAIT')) V ON (R.RM_NO = V.RM_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M1 ON (V.MNO = M1.MNO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (S.MNO = M2.MNO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT RM_NO, BRK_BEGIN, BRK_END, BRK_RSN FROM ROOM LEFT JOIN BROKEN_HIS USING (RM_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(BRK_BEGIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{day}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 13, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(BRK_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{day} AND BRK_STATUS = 'Y') B ON (R.RM_NO = B.RM_NO) WHERE R.RM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY T.RT_NAME, RM_NUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES (SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{clientName}, #{clientPhone}, #{clientEmail}, DEFAULT, 'CLIENT', NULL)

INSERT INTO RSV VALUES(#{rsvNo}, #{selRoomNum}, #{clientNo}, TO_DATE(#{checkinTime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), TO_DATE(#{checkoutTime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{totalPrc}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'), #{payStatus}, 'OFFLINE', #{personCnt}, 0, '14:00', NULL, NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'))
INSERT INTO RSV_HIS VALUES (#{rsvNo}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'), 'ALL', 'NONE', 'ALL', 'INSERT')

INSERT INTO PAYMENT VALUES (SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, #{payWay}, #{payWayMoney}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'), 'DONE', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'), 'Y', #{rsvNo}, NULL)
INSERT INTO SVC_USE VALUES (NULL, #{svcCode}, #{svcCount}, DEFAULT, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'), SEQ_SVC_NO.NEXTVAL,#{rsvNo})
INSERT INTO SVC_USE_HIS VALUES (SEQ_SVC_NO.CURRVAL, 'ALL', 'NONE', 'ALL', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9 / (24) + 135 / (24 * 60 * 60), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'), 'INSERT')
